public class SendRequestActionMapped<T> extends SendRequestAction<T,ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.spring.web.testclient.BodySpecFunction.MappedBodySpecFunction<T>,SendRequestActionMapped<T>>
Performs the sending of a request. Response body is deserialized.
